attributes.action: To drop income tax for Territorial Army Personnel and all other Military Reservists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you are aware, being in the TA or other reserve forces means you get paid for your work. But having already been Taxed on our civillian wage, we also get taxed on our reservist pay. By dropping the income tax there will be a greater incentive for personnel to commit to more hours with the military.
